name: Derek Parfit
main_interests: Ethics, personal identity, rationalism, consequentialism, philosophy of mind
influences: Henry Sidgwick, Immanuel Kant, Christine Korsgaard, John Stuart Mill, Thomas Nagel
influenced: Larry Temkin, Jeff McMahan (philosopher),John Cottingham,Sam Harris (author),Effective Altruism
awards: Rolf Schock Prizes in Logic and Philosophy (2014)
